mapper.select: select notino, n.type, n.date, n.cont, n.eno, e.title, gm.mno as gmno, gm.name as gmname, gm.path as gmphoto, n.muno as musino, m.name as musiname, m.path as musiphoto from noti n inner join memb m on n.muno=m.mno inner join evn e on n.eno=e.eno inner join memb gm on e.mno=gm.mno where gm.mno=#{no} order by date desc
